name: unclassifiable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
impossible to classify (= say which group or type something or someone belongs to): The event is unclassifiable, with music, lighting, performance, and art set against a dramatic backdrop. The three remaining patients had unclassifiable tumours.
More examplesFewer examplesThese categories classified the complete vocabulary list except some personal names and a few unclassifiable words.Her latest show is an ambitious and somewhat unclassifiable new comedy. His work, like that of all true originals, remains obstinately unclassifiable. He fits neither category, being unique and unclassifiable.
